name: FAITH (Alex Valverde)
description:
Plot

“ I don't think they followed me here. I have to hurry up and turn off the beacons to get out of this HELLISH place . ”

FAITH is a first-person exploration game set in a cold abandoned forest near a dystopian city were humans no longer dicatate the rules . Disable all the  beacons and help Joanne escape the city limits .

Learn more about your Motivations while Exploring the World around you ,

and Most Importantly, DONT GET CAUGHT ! Controls
  • Movement : W,A,S,D
  • Interact :  Right Click
Credits

This game was made in  a week and a half , as an exercise of  David Wehle's  online course "Game Dev Unlocked" .

Site : https://www.gamedevunlocked.com/

Install Instructions

1 - Un - zip the file

2 - Open "FAITH.exe"

3 - Enjoy...
